entertainment.name: Bar Rouge
entertainment.location: 18 Zhongshan Rd (E-1), The Bund, Huangpu District
entertainment.notes: Iconic rooftop bar with Bund views, dress code: smart casual, reservations recommended

entertainment.name: Peace Hotel Old Jazz Bar
entertainment.notes: Historic jazz venue with live music nightly from legendary band, smart dress code

entertainment.name: House Of Blues & Jazz
entertainment.notes: Live jazz and blues performances, casual atmosphere, no reservations needed

entertainment.name: JZ Club
entertainment.location: 8 Hengshan Road, Xuhui District (water tower square)
entertainment.notes: Top jazz club in Shanghai, reservations highly recommended, performances start at 20:00

entertainment.name: Speak Low
entertainment.notes: Award-winning cocktail bar hidden behind bookshelf entrance, reservations essential

entertainment.name: ORII Bar
entertainment.notes: Trendy cocktail lounge, casual-smart dress, walk-ins accepted

entertainment.name: Flair
entertainment.notes: Sky-high rooftop bar on 58th floor, stunning city views, smart casual dress code, reservations recommended

entertainment.name: 100 Century Avenue Bar
entertainment.notes: Contemporary bar in Lujiazui financial district, great cocktails and city views

entertainment.name: Shanghai Circus World (ERA Show)
entertainment.notes: World-famous acrobatic performance, book tickets online in advance, show duration: 90 minutes

notes.general: All entertainment venues require advance booking or reservations for peak times (Friday-Saturday). Dress codes enforced at upscale venues.
booking_recommendations: Peace Hotel Jazz Bar: Book 3-5 days ahead
JZ Club: Reserve at least 2 days ahead for weekend shows
Speak Low: Reservations essential, book via WeChat or phone
ERA Show: Purchase tickets online at least 1 day ahead
notes.transportation: Most French Concession and Bund venues accessible via metro. Taxis recommended for late-night returns.
notes.weather_notes: Rooftop bars best enjoyed in clear weather. Indoor alternatives available for rainy evenings.

data_quality.google_maps: 40+ entertainment options including rooftop bars, jazz clubs, and performance venues with ratings
